message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. Accept and we can end this quickly.
You wanted a fair split, but I think I deserve more for being the one to make the next offer!
You think you deserve more for making the offer? I think you're overestimating your negotiating skills!
You think I'm overestimating my skills? I'm just getting started!
You're enjoying the game, but I'm not going to let you walk all over me. Meet me in the middle!
You want to meet in the middle? I'm not interested in meeting you halfway when I can take the high road!
You're trying to bully me, but I'm not afraid. I'll give you a slightly bigger share, but don't think you're getting the better deal!
You think you're not afraid? I'm not afraid to walk away with nothing if I don't get what I want!
I'm not going to let you take everything. This is my last offer, so take it or leave it!
You call that a last offer? I'm not impressed. I'm going to take a stand and take the majority!
This is my final offer. If you don't accept, we'll both end up with nothing. Don't be greedy, Bob.
You want to scare me into accepting? I'm not afraid of going home with nothing, but I'll give you one last chance to see reason.
